name: Relay Arena [GGJ18]
description:
Overview

In Relay Arena, four players compete for glory in an intergalactic entertainment center by transmitting movement commands to their battle bots. Unfortunately, the signal has a delay! Players can punch in up to four inputs per round and must wait for the timer to expire before the commands are executed. The rounds continue until only one bot remains.

Beware!

*Your opponents can see your inputs and will react accordingly.

*Your photon cannon will only charge up and fire if you put in all four commands during a round.

*When a tile turns red, stay away! If your bot steps on one, it will detonate.

*Two bots may pass through one another during a round, but if they land on the same space at the end of the round, they will both detonate!

Controls

Keyboard

Movement - 
WASD (Player 1); 
TFGH (Player 2);
IJKL (Player 3);
Arrow Keys (Player 4)

Toggle Fullscreen – Z

Select – Space or Enter

Main Menu – Escape

Gamepad

Movement – D-Pad

Select – A

Main Menu - B
